title: Client crashed then banned me
body: Crashed immediately when I entered the lobby. I tried to get back before it was my turn to ban but no luck.  Now I have a 6 minute ban.

replies.body: I've literally never dodged, but you guys keep upping my ban time every time there is a client issue and it crashes.  Can that get reset so I don't need to wait so long just because the client breaks so much?

Disconnecting from a match, even in champ select, negatively impacts everyone in it, regardless of the reason it happened. This is a reason why all disconnections are treated equally by the system and why penalties cannot be removed or modified. 

From your screenshot, it appears the client is crashing due to an unstable connection to the server. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common network settings that conflict with League. 

Let me know if you continue to see this issue after working through those steps.
You know, I've seen this copypasta enough times that I KNOW you guys can't still be ruling out that something is wrong on your end.
